summary: Completed comprehensive testing of waveform and sprite timeline features in Corte&Recorte editor. All requested features working correctly including backend generation, frontend display, and ZIP download integration.
passed_tests: Backend waveform generation using ffmpeg showwavespic filter
Backend sprite generation using ffmpeg fps and tile filters
waveform_url field populated in job responses
sprite_url field populated in job responses
Waveform PNG file accessible via /media endpoint
Sprite JPG file accessible via /media endpoint
ClipEditorDialog displays waveform section with image
ClipEditorDialog displays sprite section with thumbnails
Waveform highlight overlay shows selected time range
Sprite highlight overlay shows selected time range
Range slider interaction updates highlight positioning
Nudge buttons (+1s/-1s) update time range and highlights
All editor elements have proper data-testid attributes
Media URL resolution working correctly in frontend
Job processing workflow includes waveform/sprite generation
Complete integration between backend generation and frontend display

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All waveform/sprite generation and serving working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - Editor displays waveform and sprite with proper highlights
